definition: individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general

sentences.english: Hong Kong permanent residents can open retail shops anywhere in the mainland.
sentences.chinese: 香港永久居民可以在内地任何地方经营个体户。

sentences.english: Even some self-employed businessmen are using it to search for business partners.
sentences.chinese: 即便是一些个体户也到这个网站来找寻商业伙伴。

sentences.english: This mortgage makes it easier for you to buy a home if you're self-employed people.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是个体户的话，抵押买房对你来说更容易些。
